basic_info.title: University of Malaya (UM) Bright Scholarship 2024, Malaysia
basic_info.author: Muhammad Saim Rasheed

program_details.description:
Applications are open for the **Universiti Malaya (UM) Bright Scholarship**. In the English context, it is known as the **University of Malaya (UM) Bright Scholarship**. It is a full scholarship for international students as well as for Malaysian citizens to pursue a **Doctoral Degree (PhD)** in research mode at Universiti Malaya. The UM is a Prestigious Public University situated in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. It is Malaysia’s Premier Institution.

The University of Malaya consistently ranks as the top university in Malaysia and among the top universities in Asia. Through this program, UM aims to bring together talented individuals from all around the globe to pursue a PhD program and bring a positive impact to the world. The University of Malaya is a Very Good University.
subjects: Defense and security assets & inventory innovation and creation
Social Science Advancement in Economic, Smart Finance, Societal, International Norms and Law, and Geopolitical Spectrum for the Nation & the World.

financial_coverage: Tuition Fee: Fee waiver throughout 7 semesters

required_documents: Copies of certificates and academic transcripts at the Bachelor’s Degree level
Copies of certificates and academic transcripts at the Master’s Degree level
A valid IELTS/TOEFL/CEFR certificate that is no more than 2 years from the date of the examination.
application_process: Save the completed **UM Application form** and attachments in PDF format.
Submit the soft copy of documents to EMAIL, brightscholar@um.edu.my.
